text: The Essential Billy Joel is a greatest hits album by Billy Joel and released on 2 October, 2001 through Sony BMG. It went to number 14 in New Zealand, number 15 in the United States, number 50 in Australia and number 66 in Ireland. ==Track listing== All songs written by Billy Joel. ===Disc one=== ===Disc two=== ===Disc three=== == References == Category:2001 albums Category:Billy Joel albums
title: The Essential Billy Joel
